mapper.select: SELECT teamPosition, concat(ROUND((COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_personal1 WHERE championName = #{champions}) * 100), 1),'%') AS linePick FROM zzz_datas_personal1 WHERE championName = #{champions} GROUP BY teamPosition ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3
select championName,championName_kr from champList where line like #{line} order by championName_kr

SELECT enemy_champ, enemy_champ_en, COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) AS win_count, COUNT(*) AS total_count, round(((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100),2) AS win_rate FROM zzz_datas_counter2 WHERE championName = #{championName} and teamPosition = 'bottom' GROUP BY enemy_champ HAVING total_count >= 50 ORDER BY win_rate DESC;

SELECT championName_kr, teamPosition, tier1, main_name, main_perks1, main_perks2, main_perks3, main_perks4, sub_name, sub_perks1, sub_perks2, stat_perks1, stat_perks2, stat_perks3, COUNT(*) AS rune_count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_rune WHERE championName_KR = '마오카이')*100, 2) as rune_percentage, round((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100),2) AS rune_win_percentage FROM zzz_datas_rune WHERE championName_KR = '마오카이' and teamPosition = 'utility' and tier1 = '에메랄드' GROUP BY main_name, sub_name ORDER BY rune_count DESC limit 2
